name: ENLIGHTEN
description:
The power of words and their effects on the smoke of an incense.

Ricardo Fujii makes of photography a sensitive art.

In “Ilumina”, images are obtained trough a plasmatic experience: An incense is placed in the center of a group of people sitting in a circle; The group chooses a word which represents their feelings. Focused the group lives this feeling together; Then, a couple minutes later the word is said out loud by everyone; In this moment, a picture of the smoke is taken; In the image obtained, a mirror effect is applied; The result is surprisingly.

The work of the Brazilian photographer Ricardo Fujii is a dialogue with the art of the Japanese scientist and researcher Masaru Emoto.

EACH IMAGE IS A UNIQUE, AUTHENTIC TOKEN EDITION (1 OF 1), AND WILL NEVER BE MINTED AGAIN.
